sentence: Meanwhile, GOP gubernatorial candidate Kevin Rinke launched a $500,000 two-week ad buy late last month on television, radio, and digital platforms.
author: Julia Manchester
title: Whitmer goes on offense amid barrage of GOP attacks in Michigan

author: Paul Egan
title: Michigan's primary ballot may be 'disaster' for GOP candidates for governor, expert says

sentence: Also on the ballot, and suddenly in much stronger positions, are:Ottawa County real estate agent Ryan Kelley; Farmington Hills pastor Ralph Rebandt; Bloomfield Hills businessman Kevin Rinke, and Kalamazoo chiropractor Garrett Soldano.
author: Paul Egan
title: State elections report: James Craig and Perry Johnson filed too few signatures for ballot
